alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 7:43PM CDT until June 28 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Kansas... Southwestern Kearny County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Grant County in southwestern Kansas... Northeastern Stanton County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 845 PM CDT/745 PM MDT/. * At 743 PM CDT/643 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles north of Johnson City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Hamilton, southwestern Kearny, northwestern Grant and northeastern Stanton Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
